snippet: Michael Adams, an offensive tackle for the Pittsburgh Steelers, was stabbed twice during an attempted carjacking on the city’s South Side, the police said.
abstract: Pittsburgh Steelers offensive tackle is in hospital after being stabbed twice during attempted carjacking on city’s South Side.
lead_paragraph: Michael Adams, an offensive tackle for the Pittsburgh Steelers, was stabbed twice during an attempted carjacking on the city’s South Side, the police said.

headline.main: Steeler in Hospital After a Stabbing
headline.print_headline: Steeler in Hospital After a Stabbing
